analysis.description:
LUV_Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/47/0x24102059abd9183f81613040030d2040dfa36b58.sol#307-323) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/47/0x24102059abd9183f81613040030d2040dfa36b58.sol#321)

LUV_Crowdsale.destroy (/unique_chucks/47/0x24102059abd9183f81613040030d2040dfa36b58.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(owner,balance) (/unique_chucks/47/0x24102059abd9183f81613040030d2040dfa36b58.sol)

LUVTOKEN.version should be constant (/unique_chucks/47/0x24102059abd9183f81613040030d2040dfa36b58.sol#130-133)
LUV_Crowdsale.endTime should be constant (/unique_chucks/47/0x24102059abd9183f81613040030d2040dfa36b58.sol#238-241)
LUV_Crowdsale.phase_1_Time should be constant (/unique_chucks/47/0x24102059abd9183f81613040030d2040dfa36b58.sol#234-235)
LUV_Crowdsale.phase_1_rate should be constant (/unique_chucks/47/0x24102059abd9183f81613040030d2040dfa36b58.sol#252-253)
LUV_Crowdsale.phase_2_Time should be constant (/unique_chucks/47/0x24102059abd9183f81613040030d2040dfa36b58.sol#235-238)
LUV_Crowdsale.phase_2_rate should be constant (/unique_chucks/47/0x24102059abd9183f81613040030d2040dfa36b58.sol#253-255)
LUV_Crowdsale.phase_3_rate should be constant (/unique_chucks/47/0x24102059abd9183f81613040030d2040dfa36b58.sol#255)

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/47/0x24102059abd9183f81613040030d2040dfa36b58.sol#153-161:
	- Usage of "sha3()" should be replaced with "keccak256()"

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/47/0x24102059abd9183f81613040030d2040dfa36b58.sol:
